channel.title: VBS Documentation
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: First Week of April
item.description:
Coordinate with media team to show last year's slideshow.
Announce that Cow Creeker Registration opens on Monday.
Double-check codes on website.


Update website to show that Cow Creek Registration is now open.





Announce that Postcard Registration opens on Monday.
Late Sunday night (right before going to bed), update codes on registration form to accept the postcard code in addition to the Cow Creek code.


Update website to show that Postcard Registration is now open.





Announce that General Registration opens on Monday.
Late Sunday night (right before going to bed), remove access code on registration form. Preview the form and make sure that all sections appear and that no error messages associated with the code appear.


Update website to show that General Registration is now open.



Import registration data into the access database. (See Access Database for info.)
